main event: Multiple observers reported a flat disc-shaped object in the sky over Chicago on April 22, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as being larger than a jet and having no visible means of propulsion., It emitted a sound similar to a jet but left no trails behind., The observation lasted for approximately 2 minutes., The object was observed at a course of 0112 degrees., The sighting involved multiple individuals who noted the object's unusual flight characteristics.
